properties.name: app.url
properties.description: URL of the application. Used for generating links and CORS.

properties.name: app.database.schema.handling-on-startup
properties.description: How to handle database schema on application startup.

properties.name: app.database.schema.create-type
properties.description: How to handle database schema creation when app.database.schema.handling-on-startup=create.

properties.name: app.typesense.cache.enabled
properties.description: Determine whether to use cache for typesense.

properties.name: app.typesense.cache.ttl
properties.description: Determine Typesense cache TTL when app.typesense.cache.enabled=true.
